name: DN WC Minimo Ordine
author: Digireturn

sections.description:
This plugin prevents users from completing the purchase process (by hiding payment methods and showing a customizable warning) if they do not reach a minimum subtotal, which can be set in the settings page.

Available in English and Italian languages
sections.installation:
This plugin requires you to have the WooCommerce plugin already installed and activated
* Download the plugin.
* Install and active the plugin on your WordPress Admin site.
sections.changelog:
1.1.1

Tested up to WordPress 6.4.3

1.1.0

  • added exception for administrators
  • tested on WordPress 6.3

1.0.3

  • added options subtotal includeing and excluding tax
  • tested on WP6.2

1.0.2

fixed session conflict warning

1.0.1

fixed error on get_cart() return null

0.9

  • initial version

short_description: Set a minimum import order for buy in WooCommerce. Permette di impostare un minimo d'ordine per acquistare.
description:
This plugin prevents users from completing the purchase process (by hiding payment methods and showing a customizable warning) if they do not reach a minimum subtotal, which can be set in the settings page.

Available in English and Italian languages
